channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2393] Now, Watch The Bars...(PIC)
[+1791] Trash talking kid gets owned by robot on XBL [VID]
item.description: I'm sure you've had your experience with such kids who threaten that they will hack your account unless you play by their rules, just watch and learn how to tackle these fake posers.

item.title: [+1679] Have a nice day! (PIC)
[+1112] Amazing Italian Designed Space Saving Furniture (VID)
item.description: Amazing Italian Designed Space Saving Furniture utilize any room, apartment or home in efficient and useful ways.

item.title: [+1000] 'Happy Futurama Returns Day To Me...' (pic)
[+986] The Most Impressive Thing I Saw At E3
item.description: One of the most impressive demonstrations at E3 2010 wasn't a game, and wasn't the 3DS (though that was pretty neat.) It was actually a little tech demo tucked away in the back of one of the halls that could completely change the way we see characters in games.

item.title: [+933] Growing Up With Computer Games [Chart]
item.description: From Lemmings to Sim City 2000 and many more of your 'favorites'.

item.title: [+824] I Got It!... I Got It!... Awww Nuts! [pic]
[+797] Peter Jackson to direct both Hobbit Movies!
item.description: Breaking: Despite all the rumors to the opposite, the Hollywood Reporter claims Peter Jackson will direct both films...

item.title: [+650] Mozilla likes HTML5 over Flash
item.description: The developer of the Firefox browser joins the likes of Apple and Microsoft in the argument over the next stage in web standards. Is HTML5 the way of the future?

item.title: [+646] Look and feel Canadian instantly....
[+571] Coming to an Annoying Record Store Near You [PIC]
[+542] The New Digg: First Impressions
item.description: Ever since the new version of Digg was announced three months ago, it has undergone a lot of revisions and caused a lot of turmoil. In that time, Kevin Rose replaced Jay Adelson as CEO...

item.title: [+495] Pelican Awesomeness... (pic)
item.description: Not likely a good outcome for the fish...

item.title: [+473] Bass + Piano = The Bassoforte Machine [Video]
item.description: Dude frankensteins a bass into a piano and creates some freakishly good music. Wait for it...

item.title: [+464] Report: Toxins found in whales bode ill for humans
item.description: Sperm whales feeding even in the most remote reaches of Earth's oceans have built up stunningly high levels of toxic and heavy metals, according to American scientists who say the findings spell danger not only for marine life but for the millions of humans who depend on seafood.

item.title: [+463] How to Get Americans to Vote (PIC)
item.description: With less voters showing up at the polls to decide on which candidates will become the next elected officials it was only a matter of time before this tactic took place...

item.title: [+439] Halfway in - 2010 World Cup (PICS)
item.description: Nearly halfway through the month-long 2010 World Cup Tournament in South Africa, over a dozen teams have been eliminated from the original group of 32, with the Round of 16 beginning tomorrow, June 26th.

item.title: [+412] World Cup: Ghana move into the last eight as USA crash out
item.description: The Black Stars demolish the Stars and Stripes in a historic victory which sees them move into the last eight of the World Cup for the first time ever.

item.title: [+411] The force is strong with this soap [PIC]
item.description: Always make sure your lightsaber is nice and clean before a pic date.
